[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/room/inherit/complaints_room.c

This inherit allows people to complain in unhappy times. It does the interfacing with the complaints handler and all the other gubbins.

See also:
/std/room/inherit/complaints_room.c and /obj/handlers/complaints_handlers.c

Written by Arienne

Started Wed Apr 4 14:11:50 BST 2001

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/complaints_handler.h and /include/board.h

Method index

do_complain()
This prints a set message to the player who wants to complain.
finish_complaint(string)
Check to see whether the complaint was cancelled.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
do_complain
int do_complain()
This prints a set message to the player who wants to complain. It also enforces who cannot complain (eg. guest characters cannot complain).

Returns:
Should always return 1.
finish_complaint
void finish_complaint(string str)
Check to see whether the complaint was cancelled. If not, submit it to the complaints handler. Print a message on success or failure.
